name: Verify that tapping the close (X) icon closes the sticker editor and removes any unsaved sticker.
Verify that Saving project in draft and opening it retianes the changes
Verify that recent searches can be cleared using the Clear button.
Verify that the exported media contains all the changes.(Because share screen not visible)
Confirm that when Original Audio is ON, both the media’s original sound and added audio play correctly.
Verify that tapping Add Music opens the music selection screen with all category options.
Verify that the scale slider defaults to 90 on opening Background menu.
Verify that shadow intensity slider adds and adjusts text shadow.
Verify that music can be downloaded and applied to media.
Verify that user can undo and redo audio changes in Wizard Editor.
Verify that tapping Redo reapplies the Magic effect that was undone.
Verify that Magic effect remains visible in exported video file.
Verify that sliding through the solid color row applies different background colors.
Verify that effect can be downloaded and applied to media successfully.
Verify that tapping the cross icon on a sticker removes it from the media.
Verify that tapping duration icon toggles sticker duration between full video and current media.
Verify that user can adjust preset intensity using the slider.
Verify that tapping Undo reverses the Magic effect successfully.
Verify that selecting "Apply to all" applies current background settings to all media files in the project.
Verify that tapping the close (X) icon discards entered text.
Verify that changes are retianed in same order after perfoming Undo Redo operation
Verify that sticker applied to a specific media remains intact when switching between other media.
Verify that user can reset background to None state.
Verify that user can adjust label color and background radius.
Verify that effect categories (Retro, VHS, etc.) are present and accessible with scrolling
Verify that user can search for stickers using the search icon in sticker editor.
Verify that user can remove an added audio file.
Verify that the Magic effect can be applied to a single selected media file.
Verify that text can be applied to entire duration or to current media only using the circle icon.
Verify that saving project in draft then open again will retain the changes.
Verify that export media contains all the applied changes.
Confirm that exported video contains the applied audio and plays correctly.
Verify that text can be applied to only one media when circle icon is toggled to single mode.
Verify that user can resize a sticker using pinch zoom gestures.
Verify that user cannot slide below 10 or above 200 on scale slider.
Verify that background settings remain intact when project is saved as draft and reopened.
Verify that tapping close (X) discards background changes and closes menu.
Verify that a sticker can be applied to only a specific media file when multiple are present.
Verify that tapping the reset button removes the applied preset.
Verify that the user can successfully open the sticker editor from the right pane menu.
Verify that multiple stickers can be added to the same media.
Verify that tapping Magic icon again removes the effect from all media.
Verify that tapping the cross icon on text removes it from media.
Verify that user can adjust text stroke thickness and color.
Verify that after removing a preset, related buttons (Reset, Apply to All, Slider) become disabled.
Verify that the reset icon removes the applied effect from the media.
Verify that the Apply to All radio button applies the preset to all selected media files.
Verify that a free preset can be downloaded and applied successfully.
Verify that the help/instruction icon displays duration guidance popup.
Verify that tapping the drop (blur) icon applies a blur effect on the background.
Verify that tapping the close (X) icon discards the applied effect.
Verify that added text remains on media after saving and reopening the project.
Verify that an applied audio track can be re-trimmed.
Verify that user can view and apply audio effects from the Audio FX tab.
Verify that user can select a photo from the gallery to set as background.
Verify that applying a new effect removes the previously applied one automatically.
Verify that user can access the Text editor from Wizard Editor and the keyboard appears for typing.
Verify that the user can select and apply a sticker from any category to the selected media.
Verify that if user exits the project, the Magic effect remains saved in draft.
Verify that user can cancel the recording before saving.
Verify that user can play and pause a music preview before applying.
Verify that applying a new preset removes the previously applied one.
Verify that tapping the close (x) icon removes the applied preset and closes the panel.
Verify that tapping the Audio icon opens the audio pop-up menu with Add Music, Record, and Original Audio toggle options.
Verify that by default, every applied preset has its intensity set to 70%.
Verify that the “Apply to All” radio button applies the selected effect to all media in the project.
Verify that tapping the exclamation mark icon shows instructions for using stickers.
Verify that when multiple media files are added, Magic applies automatically to all.
Verify that Saving project in draft retains the applied changes
Verify that all preset categories are visible in the Presets panel.
Verify that user can record custom audio and apply it to the media.
Verify that the user can successfully open the Presets editor from the Wizard Editor.
Verify that all sticker categories (Watercolors, GIFHY, Christmas, Business, etc.) are visible in the sticker editor.
Verify that export media coatains all the applied changes.
Verify that tapping a popular keyword in the sticker search automatically searches for related stickers.
Verify that user can enable or disable the original audio of the media.
Verify that tapping the Background icon opens the background options menu successfully.
Verify that performing Undo Redo retains the changes in same order.
Verify the Export media retains the applied changes.
Verify that user can change the font and new fonts download when selected.
Verify that user can overwrite an existing background with a new one.
Verify that the Magic effect works on both photos and videos.
Verify that when multiple media files are present, an effect can be applied to a specific selected media only.
Verify that the scale slider adjusts the zoom level of background correctly.
Verify that user can change the text fill color using the color slider.
Verify that the user can successfully access the Effects editor from the right pane menu.
Verify that applied audio is saved when project is saved as a draft and retained when reopened.
Verify that user can apply bold and italic text styles.
Verify that user can switch tabs between Stickers and GIFHY and perform searches in both.
Verify that after perfoming Undo Redo , project retains all the changes in exact order.
Verify that text can be repositioned and zoomed within media.
Ensure replacing existing audio removes the previous one and applies the new audio correctly.
Verify that text can be applied to multiple media when “apply to entire duration” is active.
Verify that label backgrounds can be applied behind text using Label A and Label B options.
Verify that applied background remains visible in exported output file.
Verify that user cannot apply multiple effects simultaneously on a single media.
Verify that a preset can be applied only to a single selected media file.
